Dragon readme.

Controls:

to change the combat and normal mode press 1 or 2
(most actions available in combat mode)

3 - takeoff (fly mode)

moving - directional arrows

mouse 1 - fire breath 
mouse 2 - area fire breath
mouse 3 - claw attack
x - bite
u - hit

i - fly death
o - land death

I hope you will enjoy =)
